channel.title: GitHub on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on inSileco

item.title: Creating a monorepo of R packages with GitHub
item.description: Context As an R developer who often works on open source project, I normally use one GitHub repository for new R packages. Team of R developers that work on several packages use organization accounts to gather packages that have a common scope.

item.title: A few thoughts on R packages
item.description: Jonas Geschke, Ignasi Bartomeus and I have recently released rcites v-1.0.0 on CRAN, a R client for the Species+ API after it has been reviewed by rOpenSci.
